sentences.en: As you descend, suddenly you see at last the hidden waterfall.
sentences.cn: 一直往下走，最终你会突然看到那条隐秘的瀑布。

sentences.en: He could not descend himself into the arena.
sentences.cn: 他自己不能下到竞技场里去.

sentences.en: I heard his footsteps descending the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我听到他下楼的脚步声。

sentences.en: I hope the grace of God would descend on me.
If a prisoner is badly treated, he may descend to violence.
sentences.cn: 如果囚犯受虐待, 他就可能发展到行凶.

sentences.en: In future, astronauts will be required to descend from a spaceship while it is still in space and return to it.
sentences.cn: 将来, 宇航员应当能从依然在太空中的宇宙飞船中下来,并且能够回到飞船里去.

sentences.en: In future, astronauts will be required to descend from a spaceship while it is still in space and to return to it.
sentences.cn: 将来, 将要求宇航员从停在太空里的飞船中下来并且能回到飞船中去.

sentences.en: Mr. Whitelaw's benevolence would descend like soothing balm.
sentences.cn: 怀特洛先生的仁慈就会象甘露一样从天而降.

sentences.en: Peter used the service stairway to descend the two flights.
sentences.cn: 彼得从职工专用楼梯走下两层楼梯.

sentences.en: She has only her jointure, which will descend to her children.
sentences.cn: 她只有她的寡妇所得产, 而那会留给他的孩子们的.

sentences.en: She's got too much dignity to descend to writing anonymous letters.
sentences.cn: 她是个自尊心很强的人，绝不会自贬身份去写匿名信。

sentences.en: Things are cooler and more damp as we descend to the cellar.
sentences.cn: 当我们往下走去地窖时，四周愈见阴冷潮湿。

sentences.en: We're not going to descend to such methods.
sentences.cn: 我们不会沦落到使用这种手段。

sentences.en: You can ride the escalator up but have to descend on foot.
sentences.cn: 你可以搭电梯上去,但要自己走下来.

words.tran_cn: 下降物；下降者；下行字母
除去…的气味；使…失去香味

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 突然到达）；袭击（突然降临

trans.tran_cn: 下来，下降，下斜，沦落，降临，突然造访，陷入（糟糕境地）
trans.tran_en: to move from a higher level to a lower one

trans.tran_cn: 下来， 下降； 下倾
trans.tran_en: to move from a higher level to a lower one
to move from a higher level to a lower one
